location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter informs that the Caun [Karim Khan] has ordered Shaik Saddoon [Sheikh Sa‘dūn] and Shaik Ise [Sheikh ‘Isa] to accompany George Skipp to Schyrass [Shiraz] in the capacity of mehmendars (official escorts).
